list.abs: he sat under the tree and soon fell asleep . the tortoise plodding on oertook him and soon finished the race , emerging as the undisputed champ .兔子很快地在树下就睡着了，而一路上笨手笨脚走来的乌龟则超越过它，不一会儿完成比赛，成为最后的冠军。
old plod , take ..., 多年辛勤工作 , 取.
over-take 超过，赶上plod on 沉重地向前龟兔赛跑
Labourers plodded home through the muddy fields ., 工人们穿过泥泞的田地走回家去.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: probably symbolic of a heavy gait

entry.tran: 沉重缓慢地走；步履艰难地走
entry.def: If someone plods, they walk slowly and heavily.

example.ex: Crowds of French and British families plodded around in yellow plastic macs.
example.tran: 成群结队的法国和英国家庭穿着黄色塑料雨衣步履沉重地走来走去。

entry.def: If you say that someone plods on or plods along with a job, you mean that the job is taking a long time.

example.ex: He is plodding on with negotiations...
example.tran: 他正缓慢艰难地进行着谈判。

example.ex: Aircraft production continued to plod along at an agonizingly slow pace.
example.tran: 飞机制造业仍旧举步维艰，发展速度之缓很让人头疼。

means.word_mean: 1. walk heavily and firmly, as when weary, or through mud;

sentences.sentence: "Mules plodded in a circle around a grindstone"

auth_sentence.content: We plod across one desert after another in our...Chevrolet Chevette.
auth_sentence.res_content: We plod across one desert after another in our...Chevrolet Chevette.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We plod across one desert after another in our...Chevrolet Chevette.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Ogren's pedestrian conducting tends here to plod rather than soar.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Ogren's pedestrian conducting tends here to plod rather than soar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Ogren's pedestrian conducting tends here to plod rather than soar.

auth_sentence.content: Given the reduction in traffic plod probably the only way to do it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Given the reduction in traffic plod probably the only way to do it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Given the reduction in traffic plod probably the only way to do it.

stems_affixes.word_buile: explode[[v.[使]爆炸,[使]爆发]]→n.爆炸,爆发
ex出+plod大声音+e→出来大声音→爆炸

means.word_mean: 缓慢进行(尤指艰难枯燥的工作)

sentences.en: Keep plodding on — you’ll soon be finished!
They’re still plodding along with their investigation.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然在不厌其烦地进行调查。

means.word_mean: 坚持不懈地做(困难或枯燥的事)

sentences.en: He plodded away all night at his project to get it finished.
sentences.cn: 他通宵埋头苦干以便做完专题研究。
